contents.content: UNIT 05 常用求职信函 Common Application Letters
杰克和玛丽在商量着准备写封自荐信。

contents.title: 杰克：我打算在简历后面附上一封自荐信，来增加面试成功的机率。
contents.answer: I plan to add an introductory letter behind the resume to increase the probabilities of success in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：好主意，你知道怎么样才能写好自荐信吗？
contents.answer: That's a good idea. Do you know how to write an introductory letter?

contents.title: 杰克：不太确定，你了解吗？
contents.answer: I'm not sure of that. Do you know?

contents.content: 自荐信的开头一定要准确称呼对方，以显示出自己的真诚。要清楚地说明自己所要应聘的职位，不要啰唆地说了一大堆，还没让对方清楚你究竟想干什么。

contents.title: 玛丽：我知道一些。首先你要介绍自己的基本情况，像名字、年龄、性别和专业等等。
contents.answer: I just know a little. First you need to include your basic information, such as your name, age, gender and major, etc.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，我也这样认为。我必须真实地介绍自己。
contents.answer: Yes, I think so, too. I must introduce myself in truth.

contents.title: 玛丽：我认为最重要的是，你要向用人单位证明你能胜任那份工作。
contents.answer: I think the most important is that you need to show the employer that you are qualifi ed for that job.

contents.title: 杰克：所以我要把我的强项写在自荐信里，特别是工作方面的。
contents.answer: So I should write my strengths in the introductory letter, especially those related to the work.

contents.content: 在说明自己的优点时，要言简意赅，切忌面面俱到。要提及跟工作最密切相关的个性特点，这样才有可能得到用人单位的认可。不要写了一大堆优点，但是没有一样让用人单位感觉到你是适合这份工作的，这样就不太可能会考虑你。

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，这样用人单位才能很好地了解你，才能决定你是否是合适的人选。
contents.answer: Yes, thus the employer can know you very well, and then decide whether you are the right person.

contents.title: 杰克：你能告诉我这些真是太好了。
contents.answer: You are very nice to tell me those.

contents.title: 玛丽：祝你好运！
contents.answer: I wish you good luck!

contents.title: 杰克：谢谢你！
contents.answer: Thank you!

contents.content: 另外，在自荐信中一定要强调自信，要充满真诚。不管你在别人眼中是否是很有能力，至少自己首先要肯定自己。写自荐信时要有条理，思路清晰，表达顺畅，让用人单位感觉到你是个头脑清晰、思维敏捷的人，就会增加对你的好感，优先考虑录用你。

contents.title: 1.我很活泼、机智，脾气也很好。
contents.answer: I am very lively, witty and good-natured.

contents.title: 2.我身体健康，志向远大。
contents.answer: I am in good health and have ambitious plans.

contents.title: 3.我口才很好，在公众场合总是很自信。
contents.answer: I am very eloquent, and always confi dent in public.

contents.title: 4.博览群书丰富了我的知识面。
contents.answer: Reading widely has enriched my scope of knowledge.

contents.title: 5.我确信我会有积极的工作态度，可以在没有监督的情况下完成工作。
contents.answer: I believe I will have positive work attitude and can fi nish my job without supervision.

contents.title: 6.我具有良好的交际能力。
contents.answer: I have good communicative ability.

contents.title: 7.我很外向，我认为我是做那份工作的合适人选。
contents.answer: I am outgoing and I think I am the right person to do that job.

contents.title: 8.我认为我有取得成功的坚定决心。
contents.answer: I think I have strong determination to succeed.

contents.title: 9.我有良好的计算机技能，熟悉各类办公软件。
contents.answer: I have good computer skills, and I am familiar with different kinds of office software.

contents.title: 10.非常感谢您能考虑我。
contents.answer: Thank you very much for your consideration.

contents.hanyi: adj. 有事业心的，有胆量的
adj. 尽责的，责任感强的
adj. 热情的，热心的，热烈的
adj. 合逻辑的，条理分明的
